pr_title: DHFPROD-5868:Set 'outputURIPrefix' to empty string if it's not set

timeline.bodyText: Can you put this into a separate test method? The current method name - "testLoadStepRunnerParameters" - is fairly vague as to what it's testing. This change really calls for a new test method that is scoped to outputURIPrefix - the name could just be "testOutputURIPrefix", and it would include these scenarios pertaining to outputURIPrefix.
timeline.author: rjrudin

timeline.message: DHFPROD-5868:Set 'outputURIPrefix' to empty string if it's not set
